attributes.action: New laws to combat illegal channel crossings
attributes.background: New laws to be brought in by the UK government for illegal maritime arrivals, and a  Migration and  Maritime Powers Legislation Amendment be brought in placing border policing ahead of asylum seeker rights as expressed in article 33 of the UN Convention.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334089
